course_title: Heritage Resources in Endangered First Nations Language Revitalization

sections.comments: This course is for undergraduate students only. Graduate students please email cis.program@ubc.ca for information on registering in the graduate section. The co-requisites for this course are flexible, please reach out if you have any questions.

description: Examines the complementary and intersecting roles of libraries, archives, and museums in collections acquisition, development, curation, preservation, and access traditions pertaining to First Nations languages, to explore how each can contribute to endangered language and cultural heritage sustainability.
